title: On kicking a man when he’s down
author: VD
content_html: They say you shouldn’t kick a man when he’s down. But that’s completely wrong. It’s a lot harder to kick a man in the head when he’s still standing.
content_text: They say you shouldn’t kick a man when he’s down. But that’s completely wrong. It’s a lot harder to kick a man in the head when he’s still standing.
